definitions.definition: connected with or belonging to the king or queen of a country

examples.text: During the Second World War the **royal couple** played a prominent role.
by royal appointment *(= a sign used by companies that supply goods to the royal family)*
She took the opportunity to meet members of the British royal family.

definitions.definition: used in the names of organizations that serve or are supported by a king or queen

examples.text: the Royal Society for the Protection of Birds

definitions.definition: impressive; suitable for a king or queen

examples.text: We were given a royal welcome.

wordOrigin: late Middle English: from Old French roial, from Latin regalis ‘regal’.
